casebody.data:
Kenneth RISER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 1, 2017

Robert J. McKay, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Kenneth Riser's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 904, 153 A.3d 67 (2017), is denied.
